title: Skayo
subtitle: Web Designer & Developer from Austria
about:
I am a web designer & developer living in Vienna, Austria and am currently {age} years old. I am always full of ideas and love to create websites, develop new projects or just try things out! I started in 2014, when I got a book about creating websites. Since then I have gained a lot of experience and learned a lot. Nowadays I develop websites on a daily basis and LOVE doing so!

If you want to know more about me check out my projects and social media!
